verses.verse: But it came <WH1961> about, as soon as Jeremiah <WH3414> whom <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> their God <WH430> had sent, <WH7971> had finished <WH3615> telling <WH1696> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> their God <WH430> – that is, all <WH3605> these <WH428> words <WH1697> –

that Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Hoshaiah, <WH1955> and Johanan <WH3076> the son <WH1121> of Kareah, <WH7143> and all <WH3605> the arrogant <WH2086> men <WH376> said <WH559> to Jeremiah, <WH3414> "You are telling <WH1696> a lie! <WH8267> The Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430> has not sent <WH7971> you to say, <WH559> 'You are not to enter <WH935> Egypt <WH4714> to reside <WH1481> there <WH8033>';

but Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah <WH5374> is inciting <WH5496> you against us to give <WH5414> us over into the hand <WH3027> of the Chaldeans, <WH3778> so they may put <WH4191> us to death <WH4191> or exile <WH1540> us to Babylon. <WH894> "

So Johanan <WH3076> the son <WH1121> of Kareah <WH7143> and all <WH3605> the commanders <WH8269> of the forces, <WH2428> and all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> did not obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the Lord, <WH3068> so as to stay <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Judah. <WH3063>

But Johanan <WH3076> the son <WH1121> of Kareah <WH7143> and all <WH3605> the commanders <WH8269> of the forces <WH2428> took <WH3947> the entire <WH3605> remnant <WH7611> of Judah <WH3063> who <WH834> had returned <WH7725> from all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> to which <WH834> they had been driven <WH5080> away, <WH5080> in order to reside <WH1481> in the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063> –

the men, <WH1397> the women, <WH802> the children, <WH2945> the king's daughters <WH1323> and every <WH3605> person <WH5315> that Nebuzaradan <WH5018> the captain <WH9538> of the bodyguard <WH2876> had left <WH5117> with Gedaliah <WH9072> the son <WH1121> of Ahikam <WH296> and grandson <WH1121> of Shaphan, <WH8227> together with Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> and Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah <WH5374> –
and they entered <WH935> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> (for they did not obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the Lord <WH3068>) and went <WH935> in as far <WH5704> as Tahpanhes. <WH8471>
Then the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> to Jeremiah <WH3414> in Tahpanhes, <WH8471> saying, <WH559>

"Take <WH3947> [some <WH376>] large <WH1419> stones <WH68> in your hands <WH3027> and hide <WH2934> them in the mortar <WH4423> in the brick <WH4404> [terrace] which <WH834> is at the entrance <WH6607> of Pharaoh's palace <WH1004> in Tahpanhes, <WH8471> in the sight <WH5869> of some [of the] Jews; <WH3064>

and say <WH559> to them, 'Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> "Behold, <WH2009> I am going to send <WH7971> and get <WH3947> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> My servant, <WH5650> and I am going to set <WH7760> his throne <WH3678> [right] over <WH4605> these <WH428> stones <WH68> that I have hidden; <WH2934> and he will spread <WH5186> his canopy <WH8237> over <WH5921> them.

"He will also come <WH935> and strike <WH5221> the land <WH776> of Egypt; <WH4714> those who <WH834> are [meant] for death <WH4194> [will be given over] to death, <WH4194> and those for captivity <WH7628> to captivity, <WH7628> and those for the sword <WH2719> to the sword. <WH2719>

"And I shall set <WH3341> fire <WH784> to the temples <WH1004> of the gods <WH430> of Egypt, <WH4714> and he will burn <WH8313> them and take <WH7617> them captive. <WH7617> So he will wrap <WH5844> himself <WH5844> with the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> as a shepherd <WH7462> wraps <WH5844> himself <WH5844> with his garment, <WH899> and he will depart <WH3318> from there <WH8033> safely. <WH7965>

"He will also shatter <WH7665> the obelisks <WH4676> of Heliopolis, <WH1053> which <WH834> is in the land <WH776> of Egypt; <WH4714> and the temples <WH1004> of the gods <WH430> of Egypt <WH4714> he will burn <WH8313> with fire. <WH784>"' "
